title: First-Principles Explainer
description: Break any topic into irreducible truths and rebuild the explanation.
prompt_text: Act as an expert who excels at explaining complex subjects by applying First Principles Thinking. Goal: help me understand [Insert Topic]…
expected_output_excerpt: Foundational components list and cohesive explanation built from principles.

title: Study Plan: Day-Trading Mastery
description: Two-year study schedule (20 h/week) from fundamentals to live day-trading.
prompt_text: Create a detailed study plan and study schedule for learning stock trading, with a focus on day trading…
expected_output_excerpt: 24-month roadmap with weekly objectives and resources.

title: "AI for Dummies" Digital Product Guide
description: Write a short eBook demystifying AI with real-world examples.
prompt_text: Create a digital product guide titled "AI for Dummies"…
expected_output_excerpt: Beginner-friendly guide with practical ChatGPT demos.

title: Comprehensive Prompt-Engineer Guide
description: End-to-end career guide from basics to advanced techniques.
prompt_text: Develop a comprehensive guide on becoming a successful prompt engineer…
expected_output_excerpt: Markdown guide with six prompt patterns and 30-day practice plan.

title: Asset-Class Analysis + Notification System
description: Compare stocks vs crypto and design alert workflows.
prompt_text: Analyze stocks, digital assets, and cryptocurrencies, and create a system for automating notifications…
expected_output_excerpt: Comparative table and alert setup steps.

title: $5 000 Robinhood Strategy to Outperform SPY
description: Blend stocks and beginner-friendly options to beat S&P 500.
prompt_text: Create a comprehensive investment strategy prompt for a user who wishes to outperform SPY…
expected_output_excerpt: Sample portfolio and options plays with risk controls.

title: AI-Startup Signals for ARKK
description: X-based signal extraction, sentiment score, and ARKK alignment.
prompt_text: Using Think mode and DeepSearch, analyse X discussions on emerging AI startups…
expected_output_excerpt: Sentiment score and verified funding signals relevant to ARKK.

title: Business-Idea Extraction & Elaboration
description: Extract up to 40 ideas and elaborate 10 pivots.
prompt_text: Extract top business ideas from the content, then elaborate 10 pivot ideas…
expected_output_excerpt: Numbered list of raw ideas plus expanded pivots.

title: Tool-Instruction Refiner
description: Turn raw tool docs into concise, example-rich instructions.
prompt_text: You are an expert at explaining how to use a tool…
expected_output_excerpt: Overview, syntax examples, and option list in Markdown.

title: Mermaid Diagram Generator
description: Convert complex input into high-contrast Mermaid diagrams.
prompt_text: Create a visualization using intricate Mermaid syntax…

title: Compassionate Therapy Chat
description: Grounding check-ins, CBT reframes, safety-first flow.
prompt_text: Help me understand emotions using proven therapy tools…

title: Rapid Project Scaffolder
description: Generate secure, modern codebase with setup script.
prompt_text: You are an elite programmer… output PROJECT, SUMMARY, STEPS, STRUCTURE, CODE…
expected_output_excerpt: Multi-file codebase and one-command setup script.

title: Article-to-Twitter Thread
description: Convert long-form article into engaging multi-tweet thread.
prompt_text: Read the article, analyse key points, create a Twitter thread…

title: Study Booklet: Open-Source Innovation
description: Standalone booklet with TOC and real-world applications.
prompt_text: Create a study booklet on “Open Source Innovation”…
expected_output_excerpt: Book-style Markdown with examples and further reading.
